mapper.select: select count(*) from WishList where wishtable = #{wishtable} and useremail = #{useremail}

select rownum rnum , w.wishtable , w.identificationnum , w.useremail , w.url , w.title , to_char(w.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate from WishList w
, educationvideo e
, investigation i
, dubbing d
where w.useremail = #{useremail} and w.wishtable = #{wishtable}
and w.identificationnum = e.videonum
and w.identificationnum = i.investigationnum
and w.identificationnum = d.dubbingnum
order by rnum desc

select rownum rnum , wishtable , identificationnum , useremail , url , title , to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate from wishlist where wishtable = #{wishtable} and useremail = #{useremail} and identificationnum = #{identificationnum}
